Literature.Title: In-Membrane Nanostructuring of Cationic Amphiphiles Affects Their Antimicrobial Efficacy and Cytotoxicity: A Comparison Study between a De Novo Antimicrobial Lipopeptide and Traditional Biocides
Literature.Author: Fa K, Liu H, Gong H, Zhang L, Liao M, Hu X, Ciumac D, Li P, Webster J, Petkov J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human dermal fibroblasts:EC50=110±30 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:EC50=66±6 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=180±30 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16±6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=9±3µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=12±2µM)
